event.name: PAVONIAN_REWARD_QUEST
event.text: You jump to coordinates left by a Pavonian ship you helped previously. A small Pavonian fleet greets you: "Oh, those are the people who helped you?". One of the Pavonian ships moves towards you and offloads a little bit of scrap to help on your journey.
Another Pavonian ship offers you some ammunition: "We understand that you going off to war, and we hope that these supplies will help you survive".
Another Pavonian ship offers you some drone parts: "We have picked up some drone parts at the resupplying station recently and can share if you need them".
Another Pavonian ship offers you a weapon: "I'm sure that you will use it only when absolutely necessary and never brandish this weapon against innocents.".

event.name: PAVONIAN_REWARD_QUEST_LAST
event.text: The last Pavonian ship has nothing to give you. But as you prepare to leave, one of the Pavonians materializes on your bridge, ready to serve the Federation.
